definitions.definition: a person who has just started a job or an activity and has very little experience

examples.text: The transition from rookie to fighter pilot starts with selection day.

definitions.definition: a member of a sports team in his or her first full year of playing that sport

examples.text: Derek Jeter was voted American League Rookie of the Year in 1996.

wordOrigin: late 19th cent.: perhaps an alteration of recruit, influenced by rook ‘black bird’.
